title: Definition of Differences Using Standard Deviation
text: Standard deviation measures, essentially, the average deviations a sample is from its sample mean. To calculate the value that is 1.5 standard deviations above the mean then, therefore, we must calculate the value that is the mean plus 1.5 times the standard deviation.
